document_data.name: Spike
document_data.mainbody:
'''Spike''' was the head torturer for the [[Cult of the Absolute]] that formed in the [[Sword Coast]] region of the [[Western Heartlands]].

{{Quote|Look what [[the Absolute]] dragged in. It's my pussycat â€“ the [[Blade of Frontiers]]!}}
document_data.Personality: The goblin was a particularly vicious and malevolent individual, fitting in well with his role in the cult.
document_data.Relationships: Spike worked alongside the [[Loviatar]]an devotee [[Abdirak]], under the leadership of Nightwarden [[Minthara Baenre]].
document_data.History:
At some point during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], Spike and his fellow [[goblin]]s burned a town to the ground, and apprehended a [[Flaming Fist]] soldier named [[Wyll]]. While his ally [[Fezzerk]] held Wyll down, Spike proceeded to pluck out the soldier's right eye from his skull.

Later on, Spike joined up with the cult of the Absolute using his unique set of skills to the cult's advantage.
